summary: A widower, his three young children, and a bombshell nanny get to know each other better when circumstances have them living together aboard a badly neglected houseboat.
cast: Cary Grant|Sophia Loren|Martha Hyer|Harry Guardino|Eduardo Ciannelli|Murray Hamilton|Mimi Gibson|Paul Petersen|Charles Herbert|Madge Kennedy|John Litel|Werner Klemperer|Herman Belmonte|Brooks Benedict|Gilbert Brady|Nikki Faustino Brady|Ernst Brengt|Ralph Brooks|Helen Brown|Larry Carr|Jack Chefe|Beulah Christian|Peggy Connelly|Oliver Cross|Roy Damron|Jack Deery|Stewart East|Joe Evans|Tom Ferrandini|Bess Flowers|Mary Forbes|Kathleen Freeman|Kenneth Gibson|Bobby Gilbert|James Gonzalez|Bill Hickman|Kenner G. Kemp|Joe Lanza|Perk Lazelle|Florence MacAfee|Philo McCullough|Joe McTurk|William Meader|Harold Miller|Hans Moebus|Pat Moran|Gilda Oliva|Murray Pollack|Jose Portugal|Paul Power|Paul Ravel|William Remick|Julian Rivero|Edwin Rochelle|Jeffrey Sayre|Ruby Scrivo|Mabel Smaney|Lennie Smith|Barbara Steele|Norman Stevans|Bert Stevens|Wally Walker|Marc Wilder
title: Cintia
